description: A 5-day, budget-friendly solo Vietnam itinerary focusing on Hanoi and nearby highlights. Includes rich cultural sights, scenic day trips, and authentic local cuisine. Travel is optimized for small cost and authentic experiences. Suitable for first-time solo travelers to Vietnam.

activities: Arrive in Hanoi. Explore the Old Quarter, visit Hoan Kiem Lake, and Ngoc Son Temple. Enjoy street food for dinner at Dong Xuan Market.
itinerary.transportation: Local taxis or Grab in Hanoi.

itinerary.notes: Visa on arrival best via e-visa, $25 USD.

activities: Tour the Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum, One Pillar Pagoda, and stroll through the Temple of Literature. Experience a water puppet show in the evening.
itinerary.transportation: Local taxis or Grab in Hanoi.

itinerary.notes: Use Grab for convenient travel; bus/train intercity recommended for budget.

activities: Take a morning bus to Ninh Binh. Visit Tam Coc for a scenic boat ride. Return to Hanoi by evening.
itinerary.transportation: Bus from Hanoi to Ninh Binh and return.
itinerary.notes: Daily food budget: $5–10. Prioritize street food and markets.

activities: Join a budget-friendly day tour to Ha Long Bay to explore limestone islands, go kayaking, and visit caves. Return to Hanoi.
itinerary.transportation: Tour group bus from Hanoi to Ha Long Bay and return.
itinerary.notes: Total activities, food, and local travel well within $1,000 budget.

activities: Visit the Vietnam Museum of Ethnology in the morning. Enjoy a relaxing spa session in the afternoon. Shop for souvenirs in the Old Quarter. Try more local delicacies and prepare for departure.
itinerary.transportation: Local taxis or Grab in Hanoi.
